about_the_game:
Core Features

  • Physics Roguelike: Experience a dynamic roguelike game with physics-based interactions.
  • Unique Enemies: Encounter a variety of unique enemies, each with their own behaviors and challenges.
  • Chaotic Yet Thoughtful Defense: Enjoy a defense game that combines chaotic action with strategic depth.



Use the laws of physics to your advantage. Be creative! Every tower, projectile, and enemy is physics-based, allowing for dynamic interactions and unexpected outcomes. Enemies can be pushed, blown, or blasted off their paths. Exploit the environment to maximize your defensive strategies, using obstacles and physics objects to your benefit.




  • Mine + Fan = Flying explosives?
  • Kinetic + Kinetic + More Kinetic = A line of explosive defense.
  • Mine + Kinetic + Fan = ?
  • Unlock and upgrade a variety of towers and traps to enhance their effectiveness and discover new physics interactions. Each upgrade opens up unique possibilities. Tailor your strategy by choosing the right upgrades to suit your playstyle and the challenges you face.


  • Bomb Tower: Explodes and sends enemies into the air!
  • Fan Tower: Pushes both enemies and explosives!
  • Electric Tower: Zaps and obliterates a single unlucky foe.
  • Flip Tile Trap: Sends foes into the void.
  • (More to come)

name: Tower Lab

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel i5 750 2.67 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 750 GTX or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Tower Lab is a physics-based roguelike tower defense game where strategy meets chaos. Absorb energy from fallen foes, unlock new towers, and synergize your defenses to protect your lab!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish
